```{r setup, eval=F}
library(StaphAureus)
vignette('EDA-III', package='StaphAureus')
```

```{sql, eval=F}
select mb.subejct_id, mb.org_name
from cohort ch
right join microbiologyevents mb 
  on ch.subject_id = mb.subject_id
  and ch.hadm_id = mb.hadm_id
where mb.org_name ilike any (
    array [ '%STAPH%+%', '%STAPH%NEG%']
  )
group by pt.subject_id, pt.hadm_id, pt.expire_flag, mb.org_name, mb.isolate_num, mb.interpretation 
```
